events.title: Python Workshop
events.text: Python workshop on data analytics and Image processing was conducted by Mr.Nirantak Singh Raghav & Mr.Pravin Pandey

events.text: A workshop on how to write techincal paper was conducted by Mrs.Prachi Raut

events.title: Mosaic Events
events.text: Two techincal events, Code-A-thon and Logical Minds, were conducted by ITSA committee where students were given various tasks related to hardware and software to compete for the first prize.

events.title: Workshop on LyX
events.text: A Workshop on LyX was conducted by Mrs.Minal Lopez.LyX is a document processor that encourages an approach to writing based on the structure of your documents (WYSIWYM) and not simply their appearance (WYSIWYG).

events.title: Workshop on LyX
events.text: A Workshop on LyX was conducted by Mrs.Minal Lopez.LyX is a document processor that encourages an approach to writing based on the structure of your documents (WYSIWYM) and not simply their appearance (WYSIWYG).

events.title: Drupal workshop
events.text: Drupal is a free and open source content-management framework written in PHP. A workshop on this framework was conducted by Mrs.Grinal Tuscano
